00027 #include <QObject>
00028 #include <QPixmap>
00029 #include <QList>
00030 #include <QTimer>
00031 #include "kvi_settings.h"
00032 #include "kvi_animatedpixmapcache.h"
00033 
00067 class KVILIB_API KviAnimatedPixmap : public QObject , public KviAnimatedPixmapInterface{
00068         Q_OBJECT
00069 
00070 protected:
00071         QString                        m_szFileName;
00072         KviAnimatedPixmapCache::Data*  m_lFrames;
00073 
00074         uint                           m_uCurrentFrameNumber;
00075         bool                           m_bStarted;
00076 public:
00077         /*
00078         * Creates KviAnimatedPixmap, and loads data from "fileName".
00079         */
00080         KviAnimatedPixmap(QString fileName);
00081 
00082         virtual ~KviAnimatedPixmap();
00083 
00084         /*
00085          * Creates new pixmap using "source" as source of images.
00086          */
00087         KviAnimatedPixmap(KviAnimatedPixmap* source);
00088 
00089         /*
00090          * Returns true if animation is started.
00091          * Returns false otherways.
00092          */
00093         inline bool isStarted()
00094         {
00095                 return m_bStarted;
00096         }
00097 
00098         /*
00099          * Starts the animation
00100          */
00101         void start();
00102 
00103         /*
00104          * Stops the animation
00105          */
00106         void stop();
00107 
00108         /*
00109          * Returns true if animation has at least one loaded frame.
00110          * Returns false otherways.
00111          */
00112         inline bool isValid()
00113         {
00114                 return (m_lFrames->count()>0);
00115         }
00116 
00117         /*
00118          * Returns active frame's pixmap.
00119          * Never fails.
00120          */
00121 
00122         inline QPixmap* pixmap()
00123         {
00124                 if(m_lFrames->count()>0)
00125                         return m_lFrames->at(m_uCurrentFrameNumber).pixmap;
00126                 else
00127                         return KviAnimatedPixmapCache::dummyPixmap();
00128         }
00129 
00130         /*
00131          * Returns active frame number
00132          */
00133         inline uint activeFrameNumber()
00134         {
00135                 return m_uCurrentFrameNumber;
00136         }
00137 
00138         /*
00139          * Returns animation frame count
00140          */
00141         inline uint framesCount()
00142         {
00143                 return m_lFrames->count();
00144         }
00145 
00146         /*
00147          * Returns current image size
00148          */
00149         inline const QSize& size()
00150         {
00151                 return m_lFrames->size;
00152         }
00153 
00154         /*
00155          * Resizes all frames to the newSize size, using "ratioMode"
00156          * ratio.
00157          */
00158         void resize(QSize newSize,Qt::AspectRatioMode ratioMode);
00159 
00160         /*
00161          * Called when the frame changes
00162          */
00163         void nextFrame(bool bScheduleNext);
00164 
00165 signals:
00166 
00167         /*
00168          * Slot, to be connected to m_animationTimer, to receive animation
00169          * frame changes.
00170          */
00171         void frameChanged();
00172 };
